question: The famous tourist attraction "Mero Beach" is located in which country?
explanation: The famous tourist attraction Mero Beach is located in the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, in the Windward Islands of the Lesser Antilles Archipelago. Mero Beach is one of the few beaches on Dominica with sufficient amenities. This beach is a silver-grey volcanic sand beach with calm and warm waters which makes it a famous tourist attraction.
